divs: sighting detailsi was riding in the car with my mom at around 4:30 pm. we had art club at school, so my mom had to come pick me up. a few minutes from home, i noticed in the sky a white\gray disc over the trees. i noticed because, well, you never see that stuff around here. i pointed it out to my mom, but she said "yeah, ok" and didn't even try to look. she probably didn't believe me because i talk about this kind of stuff all the time. it looked like it was just hovering over the trees and as soon as i noticed it seemed to turn the direction we were driving and fly off suddenly. i couldn't see where it went because the trees were too tall and we were already home by then. when i first saw it, my heart raced, but i wasn't scared. i was actually excited because i love this kind of stuff, as i said before. now i'm happy because i've always wanted to see a ufo.
Summary: White and grey disc object hovering in sky in the afternoon
